languages.translation_comment:
Escaped from the arena to other parts of Commorragh.
Heinrix: "I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."

languages.text: "Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."
languages.translation_comment:
Escaped from the arena to other parts of Commorragh.
Heinrix: "I cannot shake the dire feeling that we were allowed to escape. That 'Nocturne' could hardly have pulled off his 'prank' in the heart of Commorragh without sanction from somewhere on high."

traits.locale_text: "Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."
"Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."
"Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."
"Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."
"Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."
"Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."

languages.text: 「それなら、奴らの判断ミスですね。私はもう戻るつもりはありません」
languages.original_text: "Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、奴らの判断ミスですね。私はもう戻るつもりはありません」

languages.text: "Selbst schuld, will ich meinen. Ich gehe nicht zurück."
languages.original_text: "Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst schuld, will ich meinen. Ich gehe nicht zurück."

languages.text: « Grave erreur de leur part. Je n'ai pas l'intention d'y retourner. »
languages.original_text: "Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."

traits.locale_text: « Grave erreur de leur part. Je n'ai pas l'intention d'y retourner. »

languages.text: «Pues han metido la pata, porque no pienso volver».
languages.original_text: "Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."

traits.locale_text: «Pues han metido la pata, porque no pienso volver».

languages.text: “那就是他们的问题了，总之我是不会回去的。”
languages.original_text: "Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."

traits.locale_text: “那就是他们的问题了，总之我是不会回去的。”

languages.original_text: "Then it's their mistake. I am not going back."
